name: Right of Access
definition: Right to obtain confirmation of whether data is being processed and access to the data

name: Right to Rectification
definition: Right to correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data

name: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
definition: Right to have personal data deleted under certain circumstances

name: Right to Restrict Processing
definition: Right to limit processing of personal data

name: Right to Data Portability
definition: Right to receive personal data in structured, commonly used machine-readable format and transmit to another controller

name: Right to Object
definition: Right to object to processing on grounds relating to particular situation or for direct marketing

name: Right to Automated Decision Making
definition: Right not to be subject to decision based solely on automated processing with legal/significant effects

name: Right to Information
definition: Right to receive transparent information about data processing

name: Data Subject Rights Framework
definition: Collection of all rights granted to individuals regarding personal data
